item.description:
FIRST PLACE GARUNTEED $500!

Just for showing up you will recieve free chips. 2000 chips to start.
$10 Rebuys: 2000 chips
$20 Add on: 4000 chips

PLEASE RSVP FOR THIS EVENT.

There will be a cash after this event. There will be no charge to play in this cash game, but your dealers will be working on tips, so please support your local dealer.


Tournament Blind Structure: 20 min rounds

Levels Small Blind Big Blind Antes
1st. 25 50
2nd. 50 100
3rd. 100 200
4th. 200 400 25
5th. 300 600 50
6th. 500 1000 100
7th. 800 1600 100
8th. 1000 2000 200
9th. 2000 4000 300
10th. 3000 6000 400
11th. 4000 8000 400
12th. 5000 10000 500
13th. 8000 16000 500
14th. 10000 20000 1000
15th. 15000 30000 2000
16th. 20000 40000 3000
17th. 30000 60000 5000
18th. 50000 10000 10000


For more information, see http://poker.meetup.c...
